centiskor.ch

Awesome Pokémon illustrations by Julesdrawz

Aug 27, 2023

Julesdrawz is an illustrator and 2D animator with an eye for detail and stunning colours. His skills lend themselves well to the world of Pokémon where vibrancy and detail are at their peak.

Images via his Instagram. All rights reserved to him ©

He’s open for commissions so hit him up if you’re interested (I’m thinking about it myself). In the meantime, follow him on Twitter, Tumblr, and Ko-fi.
